resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

fields.description:
The vendored base64 code looks suboptimal. [1]
We should at least upgrade to latest upstream code which improved a lot. [2]
Maybe adopt more optimized implementation if base64 performance matters for arrow. [3]

[1] https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/cpp/src/arrow/vendored/base64.cpp#L49
[2] https://github.com/ReneNyffenegger/cpp-base64/blob/master/base64.cpp#L129
[3] https://github.com/aklomp/base64

comments.body: I am not aware that base64 is performance critical currently. That said, I'm ok with improving the code, or even using a totally different implementation if desired.

There's a critical bug of vendored base64 code. We cannot upgrade.
https://github.com/ReneNyffenegger/cpp-base64/issues/33
Created a PR to improve base64 api.
